description:
Tree Preservation Application At:
7A Willow Bridge Road, Islington, London, N1 2LB

TPO Reference:
T9 â€“ Purple Leaf Plum of LBI TPO (NO.350) 2007

PO Number:
T090310

Work specifications:
1 x Purple leaf plum (T9) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (NO.350) 2007
Fell to ground level
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The authority needs to see a replacement tree planted in the rfront garden of 7a Willow Bidge Road, N1 2LB. The tree should be of a species classed as a low water demander (N.H.B.C. 4.2) and of suitable species for the surrounding area. The planning authority should be notified of the species selection in advance of planting. The replacement tree should be planted within one planting season of the removal.

REASON: To ensure that the tree stock within the Canonbury conservation area is maintained and that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided.
